name: QualityScaler
readme_summary: QualityScaler is a Windows application developed in Python that leverages AI to enhance the quality of images and videos. It focuses on upscaling, denoising, and reducing compression artifacts, making it suitable for improving the visual fidelity of various media types. The application supports multiple GPUs and offers a user-friendly GUI for image and video processing.
key_features: Automatic image tilling to avoid GPU VRAM limitation
Privacy focused - no internet connection required
primary_use_case: Enhancing the resolution and visual quality of images and videos using AI-powered upscaling and denoising techniques.
cover_image_prompt: An artist in a digital studio using a magical brush to paint over a pixelated image, transforming it into a sharp, high-resolution masterpiece. The artist's canvas displays a before-and-after view, showcasing the dramatic improvement. Digital particles flow from the brush, enhancing the image with vibrant details. Small UI elements displaying resolution settings and AI algorithms float subtly in the background. The scene is set in a bright, modern studio with a focus on clarity and precision. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors, emphasizing the transformative power of AI upscaling.

name: strix
description: ‚ú® Open-source AI hackers for your apps üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
readme_summary: Strix is an open-source AI-powered security tool that uses autonomous agents to find and validate vulnerabilities in applications. It aims to provide fast and accurate security testing by simulating real-world hackers, generating proof-of-concepts, and offering actionable reports for developers and security teams.
key_features: Teams of agents that collaborate and scale
primary_use_case: Detect and validate critical vulnerabilities in applications.
cover_image_prompt: A team of AI robot hackers, each with unique tools, meticulously examining the blueprints of a digital fortress. One robot uses a magnifying glass to find weak points, another uses a lock pick to test security, and a third analyzes code on a holographic screen. The fortress glows with digital energy, representing the application being tested. Small UI elements show real-time vulnerability reports and code snippets. The scene is set in a futuristic lab with soft, focused lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: oh-my-logo
description: Display giant ASCII-art logos with colorful gradients in your terminal ‚Äî like Claude Code or Gemini CLI.
readme_summary: oh-my-logo is a TypeScript-based tool for generating visually appealing ASCII art logos with gradient colors in the terminal. It offers features like customizable rendering modes, color palettes, gradient directions, and multi-line support, making it suitable for project banners, startup logos, and terminal customization.
key_features: Two Rendering Modes (outlined ASCII art or filled block characters)
primary_use_case: Generating ASCII art logos with gradient colors for terminal display and project branding.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled calligrapher stands at a large, glowing terminal, carefully crafting letters that transform into vibrant, gradient-colored ASCII art logos. The terminal displays a user interface with options for different fonts, palettes, and rendering styles. The calligrapher's hand hovers over the keyboard, creating a seamless blend of artistry and technology. Digital particles flow from the keyboard, forming the ASCII art on the screen. The repository name, 'oh-my-logo,' is subtly displayed on the terminal's header. The scene is set in a modern studio with soft, diffused lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: fireplexity
description: üî• Open Source Perplexity like AI search engine with real-time citations, streaming responses, and live data powered by Firecrawl
readme_summary: Fireplexity v2 is an open-source AI search engine that aims to replicate the functionality of Perplexity AI. It supports searching the web, news, and images, providing real-time citations and streaming responses, leveraging Firecrawl for live data.
primary_use_case: AI-powered search engine with real-time data and citations.
cover_image_prompt: A wise librarian stands amidst towering stacks of books, each representing a website, news article, or image. The librarian holds a glowing magnifying glass, focusing its beam on a specific book, instantly extracting key information and citations that materialize as shimmering threads connecting to a holographic display. The display showcases a clean, user-friendly search interface with streaming results. Subtle digital particles swirl around the librarian, representing the AI's processing power. The repository name, 'Fireplexity,' is subtly etched on the librarian's desk. The scene is set in a grand, yet modern library with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: lazyeat
description: LazyeatÔºàÊáí‰∫∫ÊâãÂäøÔºâÔΩúÊâãÂäøÈöîÁ©∫ÊéßÂà∂ÔºåÊØîÂàíÂ∞±Ë°åÔºÅLazyeat is a touch-free controller for use while eating! Don't want greasy hands while watching shows or browsing the web during meals? You can pause videos/full screen/switch videos just by gesturing to the camera!
readme_summary: Lazyeat is a touch-free controller application that utilizes gesture recognition and voice input to allow users to interact with their devices without physical contact. It is designed to be used while eating, preventing greasy hands from touching devices when watching videos or browsing the web.
key_features: Integration with video playback (pause, full screen, switch videos)
primary_use_case: Touch-free device control during meals or when hands are dirty.
cover_image_prompt: A person sitting at a table, enjoying a meal while watching a video on a holographic screen. Instead of touching the screen, they are using hand gestures to control the video playback ‚Äì pausing, adjusting volume, and skipping scenes. Subtle UI elements float around their hands, showing the recognized gestures and corresponding actions. The scene is set in a cozy, modern dining room with warm lighting. Small code snippets related to gesture recognition are subtly projected onto the table. The repository name, 'Lazyeat,' is subtly displayed on the holographic screen. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: pinstr
description: Decentralized, free, and open-source social network built on top of the Nostr Protocol for curating and sharing interests with the world.
readme_summary: Pinstr is a decentralized, open-source social network built on the Nostr protocol. It allows users to curate and share their interests by creating and sharing boards of pins, similar to Pinterest but with a decentralized backend. Users can also engage with each other by liking, commenting, and zapping boards.
key_features: Create customized public boards of pins on almost any topic
Like, Comment, and Zap other users' boards
Ability to attach Nostr Profiles and Notes to boards
primary_use_case: Curating and sharing interests with others in a decentralized social network.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist creating a vibrant mosaic on a decentralized canvas, representing the curation of interests on Pinstr. The artist carefully places individual 'pins' ‚Äì images, text snippets, and links ‚Äì onto the canvas, forming a beautiful and diverse collage. The canvas glows with a subtle, interconnected network of nodes, symbolizing the Nostr protocol. Small screens display user profiles and boards, while digital 'zaps' of lightning bolts add energy to the scene. The composition is bright and inviting, with a focus on creativity and connection. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
